price: Ey Halkım, ölçü ve tartıyı adaletle yapın. Kimsenin malını eksik vermeyin. Yeryüzünde fesatçı olup karışıklık çıkarmayın.
arabic: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ أَوۡفُواْ ٱلۡمِكۡيَالَ وَٱلۡمِيزَانَ بِٱلۡقِسۡطِۖ وَلَا تَبۡخَسُواْ ٱلنَّاسَ أَشۡيَآءَهُمۡ وَلَا تَعۡثَوۡاْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayāqawmi awfū al-mik'yāla wal-mīzāna bil-qis'ṭi walā tabkhasū al-nāsa ashyāahum walā taʿthaw fī al-arḍi muf'sidīna
